text.en: Supreme-minded lord of speech in saffron-robed guise,
text.en-trans: lo chok sung gi wangchuk ngurmik gar

text.en: Bestowing supreme benefit and happiness on infinite beings,
text.en-trans: tayé dro la pendé chok tsol zhing

text.en: And illuminating the precious teachings in every direction,
text.en-trans: tenpa rinchen chok chur salwar dzé

text.en: Mastery of the ocean-like aural transmission, to you I pray.
